= Introduction =

Four points to fix your problems.


= Details =

Most problems are because of not working [http://code.google.com/p/eyes-free/ TTS].


 * If you installed [http://code.google.com/p/eyes-free/ TTS] first time, there will be maybe some problems. Wait a few minutes and then try the test in my app. If it doesn´t work, please try it again after a reboot.

 * Test doesn´t work after a reboot? TTS seems to be not working. So please read: [http://code.google.com/p/eyes-free/wiki/TTSTroubleshooting Troubleshooting TTS]

 * If point 3 is too long for you, please contact me and describe your problem!


Thanks a lot for every feedback!
I hope you enjoy SayMyName!

Tom
